Description.Name: Basic Attack:
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes up to 5 slashes ahead, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Charged Slash
Dodge:
Dash Attack:
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Deal <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter:
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Deals <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack:
EX Special Attack:
Chain Attack:
Ultimate:
Entry Skill:
Quick Assist:
Description.Desc:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist:
Description.Desc:
When the on-field character is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
This skill excels at parrying enemy attacks and reduces the consumption of <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Points</color> when the character is under intense attacks.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up:

Name: Core Passive:
Additional Ability:
Desc:
Triggers when there is a <color=#FFFFFF>[Attack]</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>[Anomaly]</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>[Rupture]</color> character in the squad:
While Xiao'Zhao is within <color=#FFFFFF>[Ether Veil]</color>, increases DMG dealt by the whole squad by 10%. When Xiao'Zhao's initial max HP exceeds 6,000, for every 1,000 points of initial max HP exceeded, the DMG boost increases by an additional 1.5%, up to a maximum of 40%. When initial max HP reaches 26,000, this buff reaches its maximum effect.

1.Name: PlaceHolder
1.Desc: When Xiao'Zhao is switched out, the whole squad's DMG ignores 15% of target's Attribute RES for 50 seconds.

2.Name: PlaceHolder
2.Desc: Increases HP Recovery for all squad members by 10%; when squad members recover HP while above 50% of their max HP, their ATK increases by 15% for 25 seconds.

4.Name: PlaceHolder
4.Desc: When Xiao'Zhao activates <color=#FFFFFF>[Entry Skill]</color>, gain 300 Decibels; <color=#FFFFFF>[Ultimate]</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>[Chain Attack]</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>[Entry Skill]</color> CRIT DMG increased by 25%

6.Name: PlaceHolder
6.Desc: <color=#FFFFFF>[Core Passive]</color>Increases CRIT Rate effects by 25%; <color=#FFFFFF>[Basic Attack: Charged Slash]</color>'s bonus DMG is increased to 150% of the original and won't be consumed during attacks.
